title: Strictly's Mike Bushell says Katya Jones crashed her car in run of bad luck

Clumsy Katya Jone s has not just fallen over on live TV – but also crashed her car, her Strictly Come Dancing partner Mike Bushell says.

On Saturday night the professional dancer, 30, twice lost her footing during the hit BBC show while partnering Mike, 53, and viewers even speculated she had been drunk.

Speaking to local radio yesterday, the sports presenter said: “Since she’s started training with me she’s crashed her car, not seriously but into a hedge.

“She’s also hit me with a stick, hit me in the face and now fallen over on the dance floor – she’s worried my clumsiness is rubbing off on her.

(Image: BBC)

“I’m known for being a bit clumsy after I fell into a swimming pool at the Commonwealth Games.”

Katya fell again on Monday night's It Takes Two, but this time it was all fun and games.

She performed another comedy fall as she entered the studio to see host Rylan Clark-Neal while a hilarious crashing sound effect played in the background.

(Image: BBC)

She then rewatched the moment as it was entered in the Strictly Fall of Shame, where the best falls on the show are celebrated.

Laughing, she noted how she grabbed on to partner Mike's tie to try to stop herself from falling.

She then told Mike to carry on as she turned the fall into an elegant floor skid.

She was accused of being drunk but insisted booze wasn't to blame.
description: The Strictly Come Dancing professional was seen falling over twice on Saturday night - but she's had worse accidents lately
